name: 360 Adventure
description:
360 Adventure is a light rouge-like 360 Degree 2D Action-Adventure game.

Kill enemies and gain XP then choose a reward when you level-up.

Beware using the shield will open you back to hits and decrease your speed.

Controls :

Arrow keys to move

A to Attack

S to Shield

D to Throw

Shift to Slide

Space to Jump
